content: A visual cue will appear along with the **voice of a child** beckoning you, and you’ll be able to use the Rattle-Drum in front of the house. Be warned, as doing so will provoke all the nearby corpses to attack you, but you’ll also get some interesting dialogue from the child.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum Questline', specifically from the subsection 'First Location - Windrest Hamlet'.
The content is as follows:
A visual cue will appear along with the **voice of a child** beckoning you, and you’ll be able to use the Rattle-Drum in front of the house. Be warned, as doing so will provoke all the nearby corpses to attack you, but you’ll also get some interesting dialogue from the child.
